articles.title: Knicks-Pacers: 5 takeaways as Pascal Siakam powers Indiana to 2-0 lead in East Finals - NBA
articles.description: Pascal Siakam catches fire, Indiana dominates the transition game and New York drops to 3-5 at home this postseason.
articles.content:
Pascal Siakam scores a playoff career-high 39 points on 15- for 23 shooting in the Pacers' 6th consecutive playoff road victory.
NEW YORK  The normal games are just as important as the crazy ones, a… [+8247 chars]

articles.author: TOI Lifestyle Desk
articles.title: ​New COVID variant NB.1.8.1 behind surge in cases recently: Symptoms associated with it​ - Times of India
articles.description: As of May 2025, a new COVID-19 variant, NB.1.8.1, is making headlines globally. Emerging as a subvariant of the Omicron lineage JN.1, NB.1.8.1 has been linked to recent surges in cases across Asia and has now been detected in the United States. While health a…
articles.content:
The symptoms of NB.1.8.1 are largely consistent with those of previous Omicron variants. Commonly reported symptoms include:
Sore throat
Fatigue
Mild cough
Fever
Muscle aches
Congestion
Report… [+777 chars]

articles.title: China criticizes Trump administration’s move to ban Harvard’s foreign students - PBS
articles.description: Harvard enrolled 6,703 international students across all of its schools in 2024, according to the school’s data, with 1,203 of those from China and 788 from India.
articles.content: BANGKOK (AP) The Chinese government said Friday that the Trump administration’s move to ban international students from Harvard would harm America’s international standing, as anxious students and pa… [+3907 chars]

articles.title: Scientists Uncover Shocking Origin of Human Teeth in 460-Million-Year-Old Fish Armor - Indian Defence Review
articles.description: Human teeth evolved from the ancient sensory armor of fish over 460 million years ago, revealing a surprising link between protection and sensation.
articles.content: A groundbreaking study published in Naturereveals that our teeth trace their origins back to the body armor of ancient fish that lived over 460 million years ago. Using advanced CT scans and comparat… [+3414 chars]
